what.title: What are cookies?
what.content: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit our website. They allow us to recognize your device and remember information about your preferences or past actions.

essential.title: Essential cookies
essential.content: These cookies are necessary for the proper functioning of our website. They enable basic features like page navigation and access to secure areas of the website.

performance.title: Performance cookies
performance.content: These cookies collect information about how you use our website, such as which pages you visit most often and if you get error messages from web pages.

functionality.title: Functionality cookies
functionality.content: These cookies allow the website to remember choices you make (such as your user name, language or the region you are in) and provide enhanced, more personal features.

management.title: Cookie management
management.content1: You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish. You can delete all cookies that are already on your computer and you can set most browsers to prevent them from being placed.
management.content2: However, if you do this, you may have to manually adjust some preferences every time you visit a site and some services and functionalities may not work.

disable.title: How to disable cookies in your browser
disable.chrome: Google Chrome: Settings > Privacy and security > Cookies and other site data
disable.firefox: Mozilla Firefox: Settings > Privacy & Security > Cookies and Site Data
disable.safari: Safari: Preferences > Privacy > Manage Website Data
disable.edge: Microsoft Edge: Settings > Cookies and site permissions

third.title: Third-party cookies
third.content: We may also use third-party services that place cookies on your device to help us analyze how our website is used and to improve your user experience.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding this cookie policy, you can contact us at:

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Cuizly, you agree to be bound by these terms of use and all applicable laws and regulations.

service.title: 2. Service Description
service.content: Cuizly is a platform that connects consumers to restaurants in Montreal by offering personalized culinary deals through artificial intelligence.

responsibilities.title: 3. User Responsibilities
items: Maintain the security of your account
Use the service legally and respectfully
Do not disrupt the platform's operation

intellectual.title: 4. Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content on Cuizly, including text, graphics, logos and software, is the property of Cuizly Technologies and is protected by intellectual property laws.

liability.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Cuizly cannot be held responsible for indirect, incidental or consequential damages resulting from the use or inability to use our service.

modifications.title: 6. Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms of use at any time. Changes will take effect immediately after their publication on this page.

contact.title: 7. Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding these terms of use, contact us at:
